tool_description: Provide a URL and get the content in return
name: URL Content Extractor
title: URL Content Extractor

api_list.name: Search Content
api_list.description: Allows you to search content for content based on a query.

api_list.name: Get Trending
api_list.description: This will return a list of news articles that are trending.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://url-content-extractor.p.rapidapi.com/trending"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-content-extractor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://url-content-extractor.p.rapidapi.com/trending"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-content-extractor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Content
api_list.description: Give a url and it will spit back the content of that url
